abilityDataList.AbilityInfo:
Keeps your arrows from flying off mark
when you loose them whilst in motion.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases deviation.</COL>

Decreases damage received from
Fire attribute attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases damage.</COL>

Increases Force Gauge when a blocked attack
matches the element enchanted to your rod.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Force Gauge.</COL>

Makes it harder for an enemy to throw
you off whilst you're clinging to it.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases likelihood of stagger.</COL>

Increases the Blow Power of Magic Trap,
allowing it to break enemy posture more easily.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Blow Power.</COL>

While in a near-death state, increases
health recovery speed when affected by healing spells.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases recovery speed.</COL>

When your Revenge Gauge is consumed,
your Savage Lash and Indomitable Lash's intial
quake has increased Blow Power.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Blow Power.</COL>

Recovers your stamina upon a successful Alchem
Fuga.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases stamina recovery.</COL>

Reduces damage from hazards such as spikes
or stalactites.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces damage taken.</COL>

Slows the drain of the Spirit Gauge in normal mode.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further slows the drain.</COL>

Slows the drain of Magick Glyph.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases the drain.</COL>

Increases the Knockout Power of perfect blocks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Knockout Power.</COL>

Extends the time period that explosive
arrows will linger before exploding.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further extends time.</COL>

Decreases the rate at which you receive
the debilitation "Catching Fire" when
struck by Fire attribute attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases resistance.</COL>

Decreases the Stamina consumed when
you block attacks with your shield.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases Stamina consumption.</COL>

Decreases likelihood of being
staggered while rolling.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases likelihood.</COL>

Decreases Stamina consumption while using Levitate.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases Stamina consumption.</COL>

While in a near-death state, increases
health and decreases the likelihood of
maximum recoverable health lowering.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases health recovery.</COL>

When your health is above a certain amount,
increases your poise and makes you
harder to stagger.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases poise.</COL>

Increases threat generation when attacking.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases threat generation.</COL>

Increases the effect length of mineral
spring baths.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases effect length.</COL>

Health recovers when collecting items
(Item drops from enemies and treasure chests are excluded)
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Recovered amount increases.</COL>

Ruin Blade accumulates element faster when enchanted.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases status effect accumulation.</COL>

Decreases the Stamina consumed when
you grapple-hold opponents.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases Stamina consumption.</COL>

Increases your Blow Power
when you stand at death's door.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Blow Power.</COL>

Provides allies with increased Defense
after picking them up from incapacitation.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases duration of the effect.</COL>

Increases the rate at which Attract
generates enemy attention.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases attention.</COL>

Decreases Stamina consumed by the "Shake" action.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases Stamina consumption.</COL>

Amplifies your Magick when you stand at
death's door.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Magick.</COL>

Extends the flight distance of True Aid Arrow.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further extends flight distance.</COL>

Extends the just timing window for
Savage Lash and Indomitable Lash.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further extends window.</COL>

Increases stamina recovery when you
stand at death's door.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases stamina recovery.</COL>

Increases the damage of thrown items.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases damage.</COL>

After using the Touch action
to assist a party member out of a status abnormality.
Their maximum stamina is increased for a certain period of time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration further.</COL>

Slows the drain of Magick Glyph when you are damaged or staggered.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces the drain.</COL>

Extends the attack range of
perfect block counters.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends the range further.</COL>

Decreases recoil after firing your bow.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases recoil further.</COL>

Decreases the attention of
enemies while using Field Shift.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases attention further.</COL>

Increases the effect duration
of Force Enchantment.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration further.</COL>

Extends the flying distance of the Seeker Rope.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends the distance further.</COL>

Allows use of Back Move while charging magic.
The charge will continue, but you will suffer
a penalty to the chant gauge.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases penalty to the
chant gauge further.</COL>

Increases chance to cause burning when
attacking enemies with fire element attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases burning chance.</COL>

Increases poise and reduces your chance to be
staggered when you stand at death's door.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases poise.</COL>

Decreases the time in which you are
defenseless after your stamina is depleted.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases defenseless duration.</COL>

Increases the range at which gathering points
will display on the map.

Increases swirling speed of Scar Move.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases speed.</COL>

Increases damage and blow power of Ruin Shot.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases damage and blow power.</COL>

Decreases the charge time of Guard Break,
allowing you to swing the sword more quickly.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases charge time further.</COL>

Extends the time period for active reload.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends time further.</COL>

Decreases damage received from
Ice attribute attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

Decreases damage received when staggering
after your guard is broken.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

Increases jump height when assisted
by another person.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases jump height further.</COL>

Increases damage dealt with the Fire attribute.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

Increases chance to cause freezing when attacking
enemies with ice element attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases freezing chance.</COL>

Your revenge gauge fills more easily when you
stand at death's door.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Gauge fills even faster.</COL>

Extends the duration of the catalyst left by
Alchem Fuga.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further extends duration.</COL>

Increases the effect of healing items.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases effect.</COL>

Increases amount of spirit gained from attacks
when you stand at death's door.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases gained amount.</COL>

Increases the amount of magick absorbed from
sword attacks when you stand at death's door.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases magickal energy absoprtion.</COL>

Provides a surge in strength
when you stand at death's door.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Strength further.</COL>

Increases Stamina recovery speed while
your bow is ready to fire.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Stamina recovery further.</COL>

Decreases the rate at which you receive
the debilitation "Frozen Solid" when
struck by Ice attribute attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases resistance further.</COL>

Improves your Defense and Magick Defense
when you stand at death's door.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Defense and
Magick Defense further.</COL>

Decrease damage received from
Giant enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

Increases damage dealt with the Ice attribute.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

Slows the rate at which your maximum
recoverable health decreases from attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further slows rate of decrease.</COL>

Increases your stun power when you stand at
death's door, allowing you to more easily
stun enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further inreases stun power.</COL>

Decreases your threat generation even
when attacking enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases threat generation.</COL>

Increases the effect duration of
effects granted by items.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further extends duration.</COL>

Gain a portion of spirit when collecting items
(Item drops from enemies and treasure chests are excluded)
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases gained amount.</COL>

Increases exhaust attack.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases exhaust attack.</COL>

Facilitates easier escapes from
enemy grapple-holds.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases escape ease further.</COL>

Extends the time window for a master
reload, making it easier to perform.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends time window further.</COL>

Provides allies with increased Magick Defense
after picking them up from incapacitation.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect.</COL>

Increases your health after leaving
White Dragon Temple for a period of time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases health further.</COL>

Decreases Stamina consumption when resisting
an enemy's attempt to shake you off.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina consumption further.</COL>

Increases damage dealt with the Thunder attribute.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

Slows the rate at which your maximum recoverable
health decreases from damage when you stand
at death's door.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further slows rate of decrease.</COL>

Increases your chance attack power when you stand
at death's door, allowing you to down enraged
enemies more easily.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases chance attack power.</COL>

Greatly recovers your stamina when you land
the finishing blow on an enemy.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases stamina recovered.</COL>

Increases your magical and physical power
during a new moon.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases physical/magical power.</COL>

After using the Touch action
to assist a party member out of a status abnormality.
Their Physical and Magick Defense is increased for a period of time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases effect duration.</COL>

Increases exhaust attack when you stand
at death's door.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases exhaust attack.</COL>

Relax your blocking, allowing recovery
of Stamina upon performing perfect blocks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Stamina recovery further.</COL>

Increases damage dealt to Ogre enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

Decreases damage received from
Thunder attribute attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

Allows some Force Gauge to remain after
your gauge is consumed.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the amount further.</COL>

Increases the Blow Power of your Seeker Rope,
increasing the likelihood it will break enemy posture.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Blow Power further.</COL>

Increases damage dealt to Demon enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

Increases chance to cause shock when attacking
enemies with thunder element attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases shock chance.</COL>

At max revenge gauge, your defense increases
and you do not stagger from enemy attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases defense and poise.</COL>

Decreases the time required to prepare your
Elixir.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases preparation time.</COL>

Increases your physical and magic defense
during a new moon.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases defenses.</COL>

When a boost is activated
Physical and Magick Defense are increased for a period of time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases effect duration.</COL>

Increases the amount of magick absorbed by sword attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases the absorbed amount.</COL>

Increases damage dealt to Soft enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

Increases damage dealt to Winged enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

Decreases the rate at which you receive
the debilitation "Shock" when
struck by Thunder attribute attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases resistance further.</COL>

Allows you to more easily perform
perfect blocks, just as foes strike.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends the perfect block
time window further.</COL>

Increases damage dealt to Giant enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

Increases damage dealt to Cursed enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

Increases the damage you deal towards
spirit-type enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases damage dealt.</COL>

Increases your stun power when your stamina
is above a certain amount, making enemies easier
to stun.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases stun power.</COL>

Reduces loss of enemy attention from over time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces loss of enemy attention.</COL>

Increases your physical and magic power

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases physical/magic power.</COL>

When a boost is activated, Stamina will recover.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases amount of stamina recovered.</COL>

Has a chance to not consume stamina when

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases the chance.</COL>

Increases damage dealt to Demihuman enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases effect duration.</COL>

Increases Strength and Magick when

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Strength and Magick.</COL>

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

Decreases damage received from

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

Increases damage dealt to Undead enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

Increases the guard power of the shield

Decreases Stamina consumption while in the air.

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

Increases your recovery power, and slows the rate

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases recovery power.</COL>

Increases damage of aerial attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases damage dealt.</COL>

Restores Stamina upon successful spell inputs.

Decrease damage received from

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

Increases your poise when you stamina is above a

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases poise.</COL>

Decreases the amount of stamina consumed by

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases stamina consumed.</COL>

Lowers the movement speed penalty when in

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases movement penalty.</COL>

Gain a portion of spirit when avoiding
enemy attacks with Scar Move.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increase gained amount further.</COL>

Increases exhaust attack when your stamina is
above certain level.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases exhaust attack.</COL>

Increases Strength when your Stamina
is above a certain amount.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Strength further.</COL>

Increases the number of arrows that can

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases arrow count further.</COL>

Decreases damage received from
Undead enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

Increases the rate at which Force Burst

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases debilitation rate further.</COL>

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases jump height further.</COL>

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases effect duration further.</COL>

Increases magickal attack after pure magick invocation

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases duration.</COL>

Increases attack speed when using Gouge.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases attack speed further.</COL>

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina consumption further.</COL>

Increases resistance to Lowered Magic
Defense.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases resistance.</COL>

Reduces stamina drain from enemies trying to

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases stamina drain.</COL>

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases damage.</COL>

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases sphere duration.</COL>

Increases revenge gauge gains from counter
attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases revenge gauge gains.</COL>

Increases the effectiveness of your chosen status

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases status effectiveness.</COL>

Increases your physical and magic power
during full moons.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases physical/magic power.</COL>

When rescuing an incapacitated party member

power for a period of time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases effect duration further.</COL>

Increases physical attack after pure magick invocation

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases duration.</COL>

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases defenses.</COL>

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decrease damage taken.</COL>

Lower damage and status effect accumulation from terrains

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases damage and status effect accumulation.</COL>

Decreases damage taken when grabbed by enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases damage taken.</COL>

Increases your damage dealt towards parts weak

Decreases damage taken from holy attacks.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases damage taken.</COL>

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases magic power increase rate.</COL>

Increases your chance attack power when your
health is above a certain amount, increasing your

<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases chance attack power.</COL>

Decreases threat generation while grabbing onto
enemies.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases threat generation.</COL>

Allows you to survive an attack with 1 HP
remaining when struck by an attack that would
kill you while below a certain amount of health.
Effect resets on logging out or resting at
an inn.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases health threshold for effect to trigger.</COL>

Party members you revive will have increased
maximum stamina for a period of time.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases effect duration further.</COL>

Increases your stagger power while above a

Temporarily increases the magic attack power of
